content.html:
I have never liked Cramer. Loud and Brash is just the start.

I also do not invest in stocks - BUT - were I to do that, I would start watching his recommendations a little more closely and do the exact opposite.

And gosh darn, wouldn‚Äôt you believe it üçã Inverse Cramer is a new ETF that allows anyone to do just that.

BTW, the click-through lists some interesting Cramer recommendations.
